comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Looking at other photos in the series, which have a date legible, this should be the first inauguration of President Woodrow Wilson, March 4, 1913, as noted, for instance, in this source and also the date is noted by the Library of Congress.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you for your information about the date and the event.  We will update the source data and reload the description.
